detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ULUDevRewards.burnRewards(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ULUDevRewards.sol#438-445):
	External calls:
	- yfv.mint(address(this),amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ULUDevRewards.sol#442)
	- yfv.burn(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ULUDevRewards.sol#443)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RewardBurn(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ULUDevRewards.sol#444)

detectors.description:
ULUDevRewards.totalReleasedRewards() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ULUDevRewards.sol#420-424) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= starttime (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ULUDevRewards.sol#421)
	- block.timestamp >= endtime (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ULUDevRewards.sol#422)
